experiences.title: Software Engineering Intern
experiences.description: Developed data intake applications, API endpoints, and cross-platform integrations using various technologies (PowerApps, Automate, ServiceNow, Snowflake, Mulesoft, Oracle Cloud, Python) to automate processes, improve productivity, and enhance system monitoring

experiences.title: Software Developer
experiences.description: Developed Python and MATLAB scripts for ADAS feature testing, utilizing data analysis techniques (PCA, EDA) on sensor data and integrating a Weather API to improve system accuracy and reliability.

experiences.title: Software Engineering Intern
experiences.description: Developed an interactive data visualization platform using Angular, Node.js, and API integrations to analyze production data from drilling systems, engineered data pipelines via REST APIs, and implemented CI/CD practices.

experiences.title: Machine Learning Researcher
experiences.description: Designed machine learning models and a platform using React, Node.js, SQLite, and the OpenAI API to analyze vehicle data, issue vehicle recalls, and improve passenger and vehicle safety

experiences.title: Product Management Intern
experiences.description: Analyzed competitor data, generated sales forecast models, and created SaaS pricing models for law enforcement clients.

experiences.title: Project Manager
experiences.description: Led consulting projects including a marketing audit, operational streamlining within athletic infrastructure, and restructuring recruitment processes.

experiences.title: Teaching Assistant
